UsePrereqs: Niagara will tick after all prereqs have ticked for attachements / data interfaces, this is the safest option.
UseComponentTickGroup: Niagara will ignore prereqs (attachments / data interface dependencies) and use the tick group set on the component.
ForceTickFirst: Niagara will tick in the first tick group (default is TG_PrePhysics).
ForceTickLast: Niagara will tick in the last tick group (default is TG_LastDemotable).
